name: datec-database-setup
description: Database setup scripts for DaTEC project

scripts.setup:mongo: echo 'MongoDB setup runs automatically via docker-compose (mongo-setup service)'
scripts.setup:local: npm run setup:couchdb && npm run setup:neo4j
scripts.setup:all: echo 'Step 1: Run docker-compose up -d first' && npm run setup:local
scripts.test:mongo: echo 'Testing MongoDB connection...' && docker exec datec-mongo-primary mongosh --eval 'db.adminCommand({ping: 1})'
scripts.test:redis: echo 'Testing Redis connection...' && docker exec datec-redis-primary redis-cli ping
scripts.verify:all: npm run test:mongo && npm run test:redis && echo 'Run setup:local scripts manually to verify CouchDB and Neo4j'
